---
title: "Contact Me"
---

<form name="contact" method="POST" data-netlify="true" data-netlify-honeypot="bot-field">
   <!-- Hidden input for Netlify -->
   <input type="hidden" name="form-name" value="contact">

   <!-- Anti-bot honeypot field (hidden from users) -->
   <div style="display:none">
       <label>Donâ€™t fill this out: <input name="bot-field"></label>
   </div>

   <!-- Name field -->
   <p>
       <label for="name">Your Name:</label><br>
       <input type="text" name="name" id="name" placeholder="Enter your name" required>
   </p>

   <!-- Email field -->
   <p>
       <label for="email">Your Email:</label><br>
       <input type="email" name="email" id="email" placeholder="Enter your email" required>
   </p>

   <!-- Subject field -->
   <p>
       <label for="subject">Subject:</label><br>
       <input type="text" name="subject" id="subject" placeholder="Enter the subject of your email" required>
   </p>

   <!-- Message field -->
   <p>
       <label for="message">Your Message:</label><br>
       <textarea name="message" id="message" placeholder="Write your message here" required></textarea>
   </p>

   <!-- Submit button -->
   <p>
       <button type="submit">Send</button>
   </p>
</form>
